title: Bluey: Fruit Bat: A Glow-in-the-Dark Book
description: "You mean fruit bats don't need to go to bed now?"It's bedtime, but Bluey doesn't want to go to sleep. She dreams that she's a fruit bat so that she can stay awake ALL NIGHT!Join Bluey on her bedtime dream-time adventure as she flies through the sky.Jam-packed with illustrations of Bluey and her friends, this book is the perfect bedtime read for fans of Bluey.Also available:Bluey: The BeachBluey: Meet Bluey! Sticker Activity BookBluey: Little LibraryBluey: Fun and Games Colouring Book: Official Colouring Book
author: Bluey
